Title: Authorizes the New York convention center operating corporation to create a pure captive insurance company
Summary: Authorizes the New York convention center operating corporation to establish a subsidiary for the purposes of forming a pure captive insurance company.
LawCode: Amd §7002, Ins L; amd §2564, Pub Auth L; amd §§1500 & 1502-b, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, the public authorities law and the tax law, in relation to authorizing the New York convention center operating corporation to create a pure captive insurance company
